title: About
content: Hi, I'm Harrison Miller. I created this super basic site for CyberCon to demonstrate how easy it is to onboard to the WAF.

title: Home
content: Home Welcome to Harrison's amazing homepage. Click here to see more about me. WAF Onboarding Demo We will be onboarding this site onto the Imperva Cloud WAF during this session. This will involve: Creating a configuration on Imperva Making a DNS change to validate ownership of the FQDN Waiting for the certificate to be issued by Imperva (~5 mins) Changing the DNS for the FQDN to point to the Imperva CNAME record
